Settings.Name: Enable mod
Settings.Description: Toggle the mod on/off without uninstalling it.

Settings.Name: Log level
Settings.Description: 0 = Off, 1 = Error, 2 = Warn, 3 = Info, 4 = Debug, 5 = Trace (Debug and Trace can be extremely performance intensive under certain circumstances - use info unless debugging something)

Settings.Name: Record Applicable Entity Properties
Settings.Description: Whether to enable Entity Property Recorder, which records the properties that AIM can use in its ItemFilters when items are picked up or characters join the party/are in it on activation/level load. Can be performance intensive when processing a lot of items in a short period of time!

Settings.Name: Respect Container Blacklist during Custom Stack Amount calculations
Settings.Description: Whether to respect the containerRoots section of the ItemBlackList when processing STACK_AMOUNT filters using calculateStackUsing. You probably want this enabled if you keep your Transmog reference items on you, or some similar context.

Settings.Name: Redistribute Consumables On Use During Combat
Settings.Description: Whether to allow AIM to re-distribute the party's consumable items when they're used - i.e. drinking a small healing potion will redistribute all small healing potions

Settings.Name: Distribute Items If Picked Up During Combat
Settings.Description: Whether to allow AIM to process a picked-up item during combat - i.e. if Heat Metal forced you to drop your sword, you would want it to just go to the person who picked it up

Settings.Name: Distribute Items On First Load
Settings.Description: Whether to allow AIM to process the party's inventory on level load - only matters to existing saves that added AIM mid-way
